channel.title: Eldritch 718 - Warbands || T90 armours || Rise of the Six || 60 Floor party dung
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmiXW/3c33d8a2de.png[/img]
[b]What is Eldritch?[/b] [/center]
[center] Eldritch is a RuneScape Private Server (RSPS) that is focused on giving you that pre-EOC combat feel with a hint of RS3's current content. We only use the cleanest models in our content, as well as a lightning fast VPS. If you're looking an RSPS with zero lag, the best graphics and an amazing community, look no further. We are confident that you'll enjoy your adventure on Eldritch. We hope to see you soon!
[url=http://eldritch-rsps.com/]Website[/url] [url=http://eldritch-rsps.com/store/]Eldritch Store[/url] [url=http://eldritch-rsps.com/Eldritch.jar]Client [/url] [url=http://eldritchrsps.motivoters.com/motivote/]Vote for Eldritch[/url] [url=http://community.eldritch-rsps.com/]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pml3n/33cd4fb869.png[/img]
[ul][*]Always up and running [*]Great community [*]Friendly and helpful staff [*]Frequent, daily updates [*]Frequent events [*]All 25 skills working [*]Five different gamemodes [*]Ironman mode [*]Completionist requirements (including trimmed) [*]Boss pets [*]Flawless slayer, very similar to RS [*]Reaper tasks, nearly identical to RS [*]60 Floor party dungeoneering [*]Beautiful donator zone with lots of possibilities [*]Perks system (Obtainable from events & Eldritch store; enhances gameplay) [*]Wilderness Warbands (Very similar to RS) [*]Majority of lunar spells working [*]Toolbelt functioning perfectly [*]Crafting/Fletching etc. can be done with just one click on the resources [*]WildyWyrm (Spawns around the Wilderness every half an hour) [*]Runespan with functioning rewards [*]Perfectly working Squeal of Fortune, with a great selection of rewards [*]New items, such as drygores, ascension, seismics (Including dyed versions), amulet of souls & a lot more [*]Perfect master capes [*]Beautiful donator capes (With a nice touch of particles!) [*]Lunar spells working [*]Many agility courses to select from [*]A lot of agility obstacles world-wide fixed [*]Celestial dragons [*]Real thieving via pickpocketing/stalls [*]Clan chats [*]A lot of settings for players to toggle as they prefer[/ul]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pml4T/2626a77cc5.png[/img]
[ul][*]Vorago [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Corporeal Beast [*]King Black Dragon [*]Queen Black Dragon [*]Nomad [*]Tormented Demons [*]Dagganoth Kings [*]God Wars Dungeon [*]WildyWyrm[/ul]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pml60/e5d71d3ab8.png[/img]
[ul][*]Rise of the Six [*]Barrows [*]Warriors Guild [*]Fight Caves [*]Fight Kiln [*]Clan Wars [*]Runespan [*]Puro-Puro[/ul]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pml7i/9243791466.png[/img]
[ul][*]Warbands [*]Evil Tree [*]Fallen Star[/ul]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/pml8X/a1b758a2d6.png[/img] [SPOILER=Eldritch media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmgLP/7294f12110.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkod/9ed0c04d59.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkp5/3be8bd8b83.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkpP/1840073634.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkqD/e22afd2b62.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkrs/0814c17de3.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkse/acbdfd2873.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmksW/a10d8672ac.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmktv/01a93f8338.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/pmkuz/101ea6a2bb.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[/center]

item.title: Eldritch 718 - Warbands || T90 armours || Rise of the Six || 60 Floor party dung
item.dc:creator: @Eldritch Eldritch
item.description:
@Eldritch wrote:

[center]

What is Eldritch?
[/center]

[center]
Eldritch is a RuneScape Private Server (RSPS) that is focused on giving you that pre-EOC combat feel with a hint of RS3’s current content. We only use the cleanest models in our content, as well as a lightning fast VPS. If you’re looking an RSPS with zero lag, the best graphics and an amazing community, look no further. We are confident that you’ll enjoy your adventure on Eldritch. We hope to see you soon!

Website
Eldritch Store
Client
Vote for Eldritch
Forums

[ul][]Always up and running
[]Great community
[]Friendly and helpful staff
[]Frequent, daily updates
[]Frequent events
[]All 25 skills working
[]Five different gamemodes
[]Ironman mode
[]Completionist requirements (including trimmed)
[]Boss pets
[]Flawless slayer, very similar to RS
[]Reaper tasks, nearly identical to RS
[]60 Floor party dungeoneering
[]Beautiful donator zone with lots of possibilities
[]Perks system (Obtainable from events & Eldritch store; enhances gameplay)
[]Wilderness Warbands (Very similar to RS)
[]Majority of lunar spells working
[]Toolbelt functioning perfectly
[]Crafting/Fletching etc. can be done with just one click on the resources
[]WildyWyrm (Spawns around the Wilderness every half an hour)
[]Runespan with functioning rewards
[]Perfectly working Squeal of Fortune, with a great selection of rewards
[]New items, such as drygores, ascension, seismics (Including dyed versions), amulet of souls & a lot more
[]Perfect master capes
[]Beautiful donator capes (With a nice touch of particles!)
[]Lunar spells working
[]Many agility courses to select from
[]A lot of agility obstacles world-wide fixed
[]Celestial dragons
[]Real thieving via pickpocketing/stalls
[]Clan chats
[]A lot of settings for players to toggle as they prefer[/ul]

[ul][]Vorago
[]Kalphite Queen
[]Corporeal Beast
[]King Black Dragon
[]Queen Black Dragon
[]Nomad
[]Tormented Demons
[]Dagganoth Kings
[]God Wars Dungeon
[]WildyWyrm[/ul]

[ul][]Rise of the Six
[]Barrows
[]Warriors Guild
[]Fight Caves
[]Fight Kiln
[]Clan Wars
[]Runespan
[]Puro-Puro[/ul]

[ul][]Warbands
[]Evil Tree
[*]Fallen Star[/ul]

[/spoiler]

[/center]
